name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Achieve: Earn Your Screen Time Extension

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Achieve Chrome extension for use with the Achieve: Earn Your Screen Time iOS App. Block Websites until your daily goals are met

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Achieve: Earn Your Screen Time is an iOS app that blocks distractions until you meet your daily goals. This chrome extension works with the app to block websites you select. If a blocked website is attempted to be accessed prior to completing your goals then Chrome will close the tab. Once your daily goals are reached all websites will become unblocked and free to use. iOS App can be downloaded here: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/habbit-helper/id6466824356
